summary: The class provides functionality to partition one or more arrays into groups based on the values of one or more key columns, generating a sorting permutation, unique key sets, and segment boundaries. It then offers a suite of statistical and logical aggregation operations that can be applied to each group.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance, distributed group‑by and per‑group aggregation for large datasets, supporting common analytics such as counts, sums, averages, minima, maxima, and other descriptive statistics.
